FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Seaspray - Consummate Sailor

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Does Seaspray’s first Alt ability count himself?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What does “on your team” mean?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Presently on the battlefield under your control and not in the KO area-pulled from starting team.
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Seaspray’s bot ability says “each character.” Does that work if I have two 9-stars with Seaspray in Bot mode?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Each of your 9-stars would get the +1 ATK in this case.
  4. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens when my highest star character gets KO’d?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    The Bot mode ability is always checking, so the next highest star character or characters would now receive the bonus. If Seaspray is your character with the most stars, he will give himself the bonus.
